CustomField.description: Lookup to the current Address record for this Contact. NPSP populates the Contact's Mailing Address field with the street, city, state, and postal code from the current Address record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the current Address record for this Contact. NPSP populates the Contact's Mailing Address field with the street, city, state, and postal code from the current Address record.
CustomField.label: Current Address

lookupFilter.infoMessage: To see all addresses for the Contact's household, enter A-* in the search window
